text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BED ADC ASTERS
Iowa State College
Amec, Iowa
March 28, 1949
TO? All Officers and Directors
Treasurer Griffith suggests that In view of the unfortunate fire
suffered by KFJU at the University of North Dakota, which necessiÂ¬
tates almost a 100$ replacement of equipment and program supplies,
that it would he a very nice gesture to forgive them their dues
for the forthcoming year and offer them a paid up membership,
I will appreciate your reaction to this.
Bichard B. Hull
President
HBHsCB
